comments.text:
No ray tracing nonsense. Still has better lighting than lost modern titles.
Go on, tell us that we need new PCs and not just better games.
comments.author: @BlankBodysuit

comments.text: I bought a dock, but there is no performance difference when you dock the steam deck, right? No overclock something like switch
